price: Huku ni kujitoa Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake kwenye jukumu la maagano na mlio ahidiana nao katika washirikina.
arabic: بَرَآءَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake wanajitoa katika dhima, wala jukumu lolote, na wale washirikina mlio peana nao ahadi, na wao wakavunja hayo mlio ahidiana nao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: barāatun mina al-lahi warasūlihi ilā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna
